1450610.name: Punch the Potus
1450610.description: Have you ever listened to politicians  spout inane drivel and powerlessly just held your head in your hands and cringed? Do you sit aghast and completely appalled at the things they say on a daily basis?  Have you ever just just wanted to haul off and slap them senseless?  Well, now you can.   As our candidates quip some of their most enraging and incoherent quotes you can use your mouse to punch them into submission.
1450610.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
